com.austinv11.collectiveframework.utils

Class LogicUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.austinv11.collectiveframework.utils.LogicUtils

  • public class LogicUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A few helper functions for logic. Has all the basic logic gates. Some redundancies for the sake of completion.
